name: TK Token
description: Purchase TK Token to empower Bangladesh's digital economy.
longDescription: Our product is a cutting-edge Web3 platform designed to revolutionize the digital economy in Bangladesh. Built on the principles of decentralization and transparency, TK Token provides a secure and efficient way to conduct transactions. We leverage the power of blockchain technology to ensure that every transaction is immutable and tamper-proof.

techStack.name: BNB Smart Chain
techStack.description: The backbone of our platform, providing a secure and scalable infrastructure for transactions.

techStack.name: Solidity
techStack.description: The smart contracts that power our token and ensure the integrity of the platform.

techStack.name: Next.js
techStack.description: The frontend of our application is built with Next.js for a fast and responsive user experience.

techStack.name: ethers.js
techStack.description: We use ethers.js to interact with the BNB Smart Chain and manage wallet connections.

name: BinGi Super App
description: A multifunctional digital platform designed to connect people, simplify services, and provide social utility tools.
longDescription: BinGi Super App is a multifunctional digital platform designed to connect people, simplify services, and provide social utility tools. It includes a property marketplace, a digital life profile, and a blood donation feature.

techStack.name: Node.js
techStack.description: Backend server for API and business logic.

techStack.name: MongoDB
techStack.description: NoSQL database for storing user data.

name: FlexPrime
description: Affordable combined subscription service providing access to premium streaming platforms for Bangladesh users.
longDescription: FlexPrime is an affordable combined subscription service providing access to premium streaming platforms for Bangladesh users. It offers a 4-in-1 streaming package with flexible pricing and 24/7 support.

techStack.name: Node.js
techStack.description: Backend for user management and subscription handling.

name: SECURITY SOLUTION
description: NEONECY‚Äôs physical store offering complete business and personal security solutions.
longDescription: SECURITY SOLUTION is NEONECY‚Äôs physical store offering complete business and personal security solutions. It provides CCTV systems, GPS trackers, POS software, and security consulting services.

techStack.name: Odoo
techStack.description: ERP system for managing inventory and sales.

name: TakaPay (TK)
description: Bangladesh-focused digital currency with a total supply equal to the population (72M), designed for secure and legal digital transactions.
longDescription: TakaPay (TK) is a Bangladesh-focused digital currency with a total supply equal to the population (72M), designed for secure and legal digital transactions. It enables financial transactions and experimental digital applications.

techStack.name: BNB Smart Chain
techStack.description: The backbone of our platform, providing a secure and scalable infrastructure for transactions.

techStack.name: Solidity
techStack.description: The smart contracts that power our token and ensure the integrity of the platform.

techStack.name: Next.js
techStack.description: The frontend of our application is built with Next.js for a fast and responsive user experience.

techStack.name: ethers.js
techStack.description: We use ethers.js to interact with the BNB Smart Chain and manage wallet connections.

name: BinGi Business Management Software
shortDescription: Software to automate business operations, sync products to e-commerce platforms, and provide invoice authentication with QR codes.
features: Integration with BinGi App and website for streamlined operations.
Dashboard for managing sales, inventory, and customer data.

name: BinGi Money Manager
shortDescription: Digital finance management tool to track daily expenses, income, budgets, and financial goals.
features: Optional AI integration for personalized guidance.

name: Affiliated Bonus
shortDescription: A sub-affiliate platform where users could open partner accounts across multiple websites and receive 50% of generated revenue.
features: Users could create accounts for trading and other services.
Revenue sharing model: 50% of NEONECY revenue given to users.
Active for 4 months before partner account bans led to closure.
